titleStmt.title: Comparative theology, or, The true and solid grounds of pure and peaceable theology a subject very necessary, tho' hitherto almost wholly neglected : proposed in a university discourse / and now translated from the printed Latin copy, with some few enlargements by the author.
titleStmt.author: Garden, James, 1647-1726.

titleStmt.title: Comparative theology, or, The true and solid grounds of pure and peaceable theology a subject very necessary, tho' hitherto almost wholly neglected : proposed in a university discourse / and now translated from the printed Latin copy, with some few enlargements by the author.
titleStmt.author: Garden, James, 1647-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by the booksellers of London, and Westminister,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Garden by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Errors in paging: p. 13 and 112 misnumbered 31 and 102.
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
